officialTitle: The ViVEXX Carotid Revascularization Trial (VIVA) for High Surgical Risk Patients With Extracranial Carotid Artery Stenosis Using the Bard ViVEXX Carotid Stent and Emboshield BareWire Rapid Exchange Embolic Protection System

arms.label: stent placement in the carotid artery

summary: To evaluate the safety and efficacy of the Bard ViVEXX Carotid Stent and Emboshield BareWire Rapid Exchange Embolic Protection System in the treatment of extracranial carotid artery stenosis in patients at high risk for carotid endarterectomy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Patients Experiencing Major Adverse Events (MAE)
